update.description: pull request #77 was added [as a patch](http://anonscm.debian.org/gitweb/?p=debian-science/packages/sdformat.git;a=blob;f=debian/patches/0001-Support-to-use-external-URDF.patch;h=adce2166161d653e8748b3a9b960ff8c02be8230;hb=69a8bd999590241e73ec91071daa007a9e44833a) to debian released 1.4.11, but debian released urdfdom is versioned at 0.2.x, so breaking sdformat's urdf parser.  This pull request checks to see if external urdf library version is < 0.3, skip changes per pull request #77.
update.title: attempt to fix issue #63

content.raw: arg, right. Modified locally versions of urdfdom. After reinstall, all is working fine with external 0.2 headers. test is passing. Thanks John, Steve.
content.html: arg, right. Modified locally versions of urdfdom. After reinstall, all is working fine with external 0.2 headers. test is passing. Thanks John, Steve.

content.raw:
On raring compiled using internal embedded copy: works.
On trusty compiled using external urdfdom 0.2, I'm getting this failure:

```
In file included from /home/jrivero/code/sdformat2/src/parser_urdf.cc:22:0:
/usr/include/urdf_model/model.h: In member function 'void urdf::ModelInterface::initTree(std::map<std::basic_string<char>, std::basic_string<char> >&)':
/usr/include/urdf_model/model.h:147:9: error: 'cout' is not a member of 'std'
         std::cout << "Before adding: " << parent_link->child_joints.size() << std::endl;
         ^
/usr/include/urdf_model/model.h:149:9: error: 'cout' is not a member of 'std'
         std::cout << "After adding: " << parent_link->child_joints.size() << std::endl;
         ^
/home/jrivero/code/sdformat2/src/parser_urdf.cc: In function 'void ReduceCollisionToParent(UrdfLinkPtr, const string&, UrdfCollisionPtr)':
/home/jrivero/code/sdformat2/src/parser_urdf.cc:316:41: warning: 'boost::shared_ptr<std::vector<boost::shared_ptr<urdf::Collision> > > urdf::Link::getCollisions(const string&) const' is deprecated (declared at /usr/include/urdf_model/link.h:264) [-Wdeprecated-declarations]
   cols = _link->getCollisions(_groupName);
                                         ^
/home/jrivero/code/sdformat2/src/parser_urdf.cc: In function 'void ReduceVisualToParent(UrdfLinkPtr, const string&, UrdfVisualPtr)':
/home/jrivero/code/sdformat2/src/parser_urdf.cc:356:38: warning: 'boost::shared_ptr<std::vector<boost::shared_ptr<urdf::Visual> > > urdf::Link::getVisuals(const string&) const' is deprecated (declared at /usr/include/urdf_model/link.h:255) [-Wdeprecated-declarations]
   viss = _link->getVisuals(_groupName);
                                      ^
```
A missing  #include <iostream> somewhere? Are you able to reproduce it?
content.html:
On raring compiled using internal embedded copy: works. On trusty compiled using external urdfdom 0.2, I'm getting this failure:

In file included from /home/jrivero/code/sdformat2/src/parser_urdf.cc:22:0:
/usr/include/urdf_model/model.h: In member function 'void urdf::ModelInterface::initTree(std::map<std::basic_string<char>, std::basic_string<char> >&)':
/usr/include/urdf_model/model.h:147:9: error: 'cout' is not a member of 'std'
         std::cout << "Before adding: " << parent_link->child_joints.size() << std::endl;
         ^
/usr/include/urdf_model/model.h:149:9: error: 'cout' is not a member of 'std'
         std::cout << "After adding: " << parent_link->child_joints.size() << std::endl;
         ^
/home/jrivero/code/sdformat2/src/parser_urdf.cc: In function 'void ReduceCollisionToParent(UrdfLinkPtr, const string&, UrdfCollisionPtr)':
/home/jrivero/code/sdformat2/src/parser_urdf.cc:316:41: warning: 'boost::shared_ptr<std::vector<boost::shared_ptr<urdf::Collision> > > urdf::Link::getCollisions(const string&) const' is deprecated (declared at /usr/include/urdf_model/link.h:264) [-Wdeprecated-declarations]
   cols = _link->getCollisions(_groupName);
                                         ^
/home/jrivero/code/sdformat2/src/parser_urdf.cc: In function 'void ReduceVisualToParent(UrdfLinkPtr, const string&, UrdfVisualPtr)':
/home/jrivero/code/sdformat2/src/parser_urdf.cc:356:38: warning: 'boost::shared_ptr<std::vector<boost::shared_ptr<urdf::Visual> > > urdf::Link::getVisuals(const string&) const' is deprecated (declared at /usr/include/urdf_model/link.h:255) [-Wdeprecated-declarations]
   viss = _link->getVisuals(_groupName);
                                      ^

A missing #include <iostream> somewhere? Are you able to reproduce it?

content.raw: Could we please remove the debug messages?
content.html: Could we please remove the debug messages?

content.raw: I just remembered why these tests are failing. In pull request #94 (sdf_2.0 branch) we merged a fix that allows `make test` to be run without `make install`. After that I updated the drone.io script accordingly, but this sdf_1.4 branch has test failures if `make test` is run before `make install`. So these failures aren't unexpected.
content.html: I just remembered why these tests are failing. In pull request #94 (sdf_2.0 branch) we merged a fix that allows make test to be run without make install. After that I updated the drone.io script accordingly, but this sdf_1.4 branch has test failures if make test is run before make install. So these failures aren't unexpected.
